br.com.caelum.vraptor.cache

Interface CacheStore<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of the cache key
    V - type of the cache value
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCacheStore, LRUCacheStore

    public interface CacheStore<K,V>
    An API to use as internal VRaptor cache
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti, Alberto Souza

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V fetch(K key)
      Fetches the value under the key
      V fetch(K key, com.google.common.base.Supplier<V> valueProvider)
      Fetches the value under the key.
      V write(K key, V value)
      Writes a value on the cache

    • Method Detail

      • write

        V write(K key,
        V value)
        Writes a value on the cache
        Parameters:
        key -
        value -
        Returns:
        the previous stored value, null if none.

      • fetch

        V fetch(K key)
        Fetches the value under the key
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        the stored value for the key, or null.

      • fetch

        V fetch(K key,
        com.google.common.base.Supplier<V> valueProvider)
        Fetches the value under the key. If no value is set, valueProvider is used to compute a value for the key. Once the value is computed, it is stored on the cache.
        Parameters:
        key -
        valueProvider -
        Returns:
        the stored or the new value for the provided key.
